messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: new e-mail loop for physically challenged hs parents
messages.msgSnippet: Buzz, Could you please add me to the list. I tried twice to do it through coollist and both confirmation emails they sent only had my email addy to reply too.
messages.messageBody:
Buzz,
Could you please add me to the list. I tried twice to do it through coollist
and both confirmation emails they sent only had my email addy to reply too.
Thanks for your help.
Amy (kworthen@...)
----- Original Message -----
From: D Klement <klement@...>
To: Peta Coffeng <peta_frank@...>; Anne Mountfield
<ebus225@...>; Cheryl Wright <cherylwright@...>; dawn
<dawn@...>; <Momandmore@...>; Tia Leschke
<leschke@...>; Home School Canada List
<homeschool-ca@...>; <oftp@egroups.com>;
<Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>; Cameron and Barbara Miller
<sumfun@...>
Sent: Sunday, July 02, 2000 6:40 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: new e-mail loop for physically challenged
hs parents


> Hello everyone!
> I have just set up the new list at www.coollist.com
> pchs-parents@...
> The list's name is phy-challenged home educators.
>
> I can add you to the users list or you can go to www.coollist.com and
> look under
> " join a new list " then follow these instructions I copied from their
> help page below......
>
> > To join a new mailing list:
> >
> > 1) Just enter the list name that you want to s*bscribe and your email
address.
>
> ****This would be pchs-parents@...
>
> > 2) You are then require to check your mail to confirm your
s*bscription.
> > 3) Click on the link provided in the email message.
> > 4) Enter a password so that in future, you can login to Coollist with
your email
> > address and password to s*bscribe/uns*bscribe to other mailing
lists.
>
>
> Please pass this on to ANY and ALL homeschool related lists that you are
> on
> ( UU homeschooling, Pagan and Christian lists etc ).
> Please feel free to post it on homeschooling web sites and message
> boards etc.
>
> So far I have 5 confirmed interested people. Volume may be light.
> I sent a tesst message and it came back to me just fine.
>
>
> Debbie (Buzz) Klement
> phy-challenged home educators list owner
>
> --
